Text:
theres only 3 episodes in whole series?
perhaps "Season 1" more accurate?
No dipstick. There is no plan to make any more than the 3 produced last year so it is right to refer to it as a complete series.

This is complete series SIX (The brits tend to call them "series" instead of "seasons".) and it really has only three episodes.
Series 1-5 are from the seventies and can be found as a different torrent.
Actually.. they are planning on doing a 2nd series this year.

second season has started! OH BURN!
